extDescription.message: Prayer Times including all year timetable for any location in the world. Including prayer time notifications.

timetableGregorianDay.description: The label 'Day' for the gregorian month. Usually numbered from 1-31

timetableHijriDay.description: The label 'Hijri' for the month. The islamic day in the form of Ramadan 24

popupMonthlyView.description: Appears in the popup, for the label to navigate to timetable.

popupUpcomingPrayerTime.description: The label that shows what is coming next, upcoming

optionsTimenameTitle.description: The option title to modify the visible timenames

optionsTimenameColumnName.description: The header name for the timenames

optionsTimenameColumnOffset.description: The header name for the timenames offset in minutes
